titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Maurice O'Connor Drury, [1936]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Inhaltsangabe (Drurys Notizen 1936, zit. nach Nedo, 1983, S. 283).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: ["[In a letter Wittgenstein said] that he and Francis Skinner were seriously thinking of coming to Dublin and joining me in studying medicine, and he asked me to make enquiries about the possibility of the two of them entering the medical school."]
